TextView.android:text: Autolights is an android app developed to support IoT services. The app comes with features such as user registration, adding devices and then controlling. Here each switch when controlled on and off would update the status in database which when connected to a directs the status to the device. The whole idea is to add a remote control feature to all the switches at home for easy access and security. For more details and code of the app visit https://github.com/ssk-karna/AutoLights_app . To checkout developer visit https://www.linkedin.com/in/ssk-karna/. For any feedback drop a message at @ssk_karna on twitter.
